entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:49 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 03:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
